title: Collaborative Workflow-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Process

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical operations, graph interpretation, and foundational digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Work-applicable mathematics problem-solving competency enhancement course for office/administrative professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design a multi-stage mathematical modeling process (three or more stages) using collaborative workflow systems.
Learners can solve complex statistical problems with 80% accuracy by leveraging data interoperability features across digital tools.
Learners can complete task-scenario-based problem-solving projects by negotiating tool invocation sequences and role distribution among team members.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
